user_profile.name: Fernando Ortega
user_profile.description: Fernando is a 67-year-old retired professor from Latin America, known for his creative thinking and casual communication style. With extensive experience in technology and a direct approach to problem-solving, he approaches the task of booking a nurse for his father with patience and attention to detail, despite his limited mobility. Although he has no prior experience in caregiving arrangements, his adaptable nature enables him to navigate this challenge, motivated by his deep concern for his father's well-being.

task_profile.task: book a nurse for my father

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Assistance with daily activities like bathing and dressing
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online service platforms or local caregiver agencies
additional_requirements: Ability to provide transportation to medical appointments
